short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search team knowledge with the press of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free and open-source add-on to speed up your ability to find information in Confluence. Open a search box using a keyboard shortcut (assigned in chrome://extensions/settings) or type "con <query>" in your browser's omnibox to launch a search in a new tab. No ads!
